block.p: GRETSCH-Dorothy of Jupiter, Florida, formerly of Glen Head, New York, died May 20, 2000. Wife of the late Fred Gretch, Jr. and Arturo R. Antolini, mother of Robert D. Antolini, Carole Scherer and Susan Hancock, stepmother of Happy Copley, grandmother of eight; great grandmother of nine. Mass Thursday May 25, 9:45 AM, at St. Mary's Church, Northern Boulevard, Manhasset. Donations to Convent of the Sacred Heart Kenwood, 799 South Pearl, Albany, New York 12202. Taylor & Modeen Funeral Home, Jupiter, Florida.
